value: 3444 - Sheet Metalwork Summary > Metroll Roofing Pty Ltd is engaged in the manufacture and sale of metal roofing and cladding products. The roofing and cladding products come in a range of materials, grades of metal, colours and shapes, and service domestic, rural, commercial and industrial applications. The company forms part of the Metroll group, which is a leading manufacturer and supplier of roofing, cladding, rainwater, structural and fencing products. In turn, the Metroll group is wholly-owned by the Panama-based Pacific Industrial Corporation S.A. Metroll has a branch network that spans metropolitan and regional areas across all Australian states and the Northern Territory. Metroll Roofing is based in Currajong, outside Townsville in Queensland.
